The Buoyancy package will adjust the conductances in the model based on the solute concentrations. For each chemical species, the user specifies a reference concentration and DRHODC. DRHODC is the slope of the line relating concentration to fluid density. The user also specifies a reference density which is typically the density of fresh water at 25° C. (997.08 kg/m).
